programs.name: Youth Mental Health
programs.description: Individual and group counselling for youth aged 12-18 experiencing anxiety, depression, or emotional difficulties.

programs.name: Transitional Housing
programs.description: Supported housing for youth aged 16-24 transitioning from care or experiencing homelessness.

programs.name: Employment Readiness
programs.description: Resume building, interview skills, and job coaching for youth aged 15-24.

programs.name: Youth Drop-In
programs.name_fr: Centre sans rendez-vous pour les jeunes
programs.description: Open drop-in programming including homework help, recreation, and peer mentorship for youth aged 12-18.

plan_templates.name: Mental Health Support Plan
plan_templates.name_fr: Plan de soutien en santé mentale
plan_templates.description: Standard plan template for youth mental health counselling.

targets.name: Develop healthy coping strategies
targets.description: Youth will identify and practise at least 3 healthy coping strategies for managing stress and difficult emotions.

targets.name: Improve self-regulation skills
targets.description: Youth will demonstrate improved ability to manage emotional responses in everyday situations.

targets.name: Build positive peer relationships
targets.description: Youth will identify and maintain at least 2 positive peer relationships.

targets.name: Increase community involvement
targets.description: Youth will participate in at least one community activity or group per month.

plan_templates.name: Housing Stability Plan
plan_templates.description: Standard plan template for transitional housing program.

targets.name: Maintain stable housing for 3+ months
targets.description: Youth will maintain current housing placement with consistent compliance with house rules.

targets.name: Develop independent living skills
targets.description: Youth will demonstrate competency in budgeting, cooking, cleaning, and household management.

targets.name: Enrol in or maintain education or employment
targets.description: Youth will be actively enrolled in school, training, or employed at least part-time.

targets.name: Create and follow a monthly budget
targets.description: Youth will develop a realistic monthly budget and track expenses for at least 2 consecutive months.

targets.name: Access community resources independently
targets.description: Youth will navigate at least 3 community services (doctor, transit, government) without staff support.

plan_templates.name: Employment Readiness Plan
plan_templates.description: Standard plan template for employment readiness program.

targets.name: Complete a polished resume and cover letter
targets.description: Youth will create an up-to-date resume and tailored cover letter suitable for their target job type.

targets.name: Develop interview confidence
targets.description: Youth will participate in at least 3 mock interviews and demonstrate improved performance.

targets.name: Secure employment or training placement
targets.description: Youth will obtain a job offer, volunteer placement, or enrol in a skills training program.

metrics_enabled: Since we last met, how are things going?
How connected do you feel to the group?
metrics_disabled: Comfort with English in daily life
